title: Building a Dominant Brand with a Podcast with Erik Allen
itunes:title: Building a Dominant Brand with a Podcast with Erik Allen
description:
Sharing stories empowers action. We take what we learn from those stories, apply it to our own, and continue learning how to grow as a person.  

Erik Allen is a podcast entrepreneur and content creator. Last year he purchased one of Zach’s courses and his brand excelled. However, before building a dominant brand, Erik grew up in a broken home with a complicated childhood and says he lived a “rockstar” lifestyle for many years, drinking and doing drugs. Over sixteen years ago he decided to change his life and has been sober ever since.  

On this episode of Underdog Empowerment, Zach and Erik connect over their childhood trauma and how they worked to overcome those experiences later in life. Erik also breaks down how he structures his every day to position him to be successful. Listen in for an episode that will empower you to overcome.

Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/erik-allen
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://underdogempowerment.com/roadmap
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
